attributes.action: Stop UK sponsored lawers hounding  Armed Forces in Afghanistan
attributes.background: UK Army personell fighting in Afghanistan are are being hounded and investigated by UK Government sponsored  lawyers trying to make money from our brave soldiers on trumped up charges of murder , harassment etc
